Chemistry Data was created by Allen Guo, and uses chemical element data obtained from Wikipedia (available under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 Unported License).

The accuracy of the data provided by Chemistry Data is not guaranteed by the author.

The source code of Chemistry Data is released under the MIT License.

Weight is given in g/mol. Density is given in g/cm^3. Melt and Boil (melting and boiling points) are given in K. Heat (specific heat capacity) is given in J/(K*g). Neg is electronegativity on the Pauling scale. Abundance (in the Earth\'s crust) is given in mg/kg.
